name: Site Editor Google Map – with drag and drop
author: Site Editor Team

sections.description:
Site Editor Google Map add simple google map to your site with Site Editor

This plugin is a extension for Site Editor and you can add your google map to any page or post with drag & drop very easy!

OUR OFFICIAL WEBSITE & GITHUB

SiteEditor.ORG

SiteEditor GitHub Repository

Features:

  • 100% MOBILE FRIENDLY
  • Responsive maps
  • Add to any page or post with drag & drop
  • Super easy to use, no coding required!
  • Add Multi Addresses to map
  • Support “roadmap” , “satellite” , “hybrid” and “terrain” map type
  • Custom Zoom Level
  • Custom Overlay Color
  • Custom Width
  • Custom Height
  • Show or hide Control map type
  • Show or hide Pan Control on Map
  • Show or hide Street view control
  • Scrollwheel on Map
  • Show or hide Scale Control on Map
  • Animation for show map
  • Add Custom Description
sections.installation:
1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Site Editor”
  3. Click “Install”
sections.faq:
Troubleshooting:

Installation Instructions

  1. Go to the Plugins Menu in WordPress
  2. Search for “Site Editor”
  3. Click “Install”

https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/site-editor-google-map
sections.changelog:
1.0

1.0 – Released: April 19th, 2017

  • Initial release

1.0.1

1.0.1 – Released: May 2th, 2017

  • Remove Extra Settings

  • Add New Settings

short_description: The best solution for add Google Map to your Wordpress site with The best drag and drop WordPress Site Builder and Page Builder.
